<syslog>

    <Category></Category>
    <RequestId></RequestId>
    <Reason></Reason>

      <CAProperty Name="UserName" Value="Administrator2"></CAProperty>

      <CAProperty Name="LastSuccessReconciliation" Value="1604944215"></CAProperty>
      <CAProperty Name="Customer" Value="EvilCorp"></CAProperty>
    </CAProperties>
  </audit_record>
